text: when getting started in the cloud
you might be looking for a simple way to
create and manage your high-performance
computing environments
and aws is here to bridge the gap and
make the switch from on-premises setups
easy aws parallel cluster is an open
source
tool that allows you to effectively
scale and manage your hpc
clusters on aws with a simple text file
you can describe the resources you need
to run your hpc workloads
this enables aws to automatically and
securely provision your compute and
storage environment
parallel cluster scales up compute
capacity on demand
efficiently reducing job wait times and
automatically scales down to save costs
when capacity is idle
choose from multiple job schedulers such
as slurm
or amazon's own aws batch to launch your
batch processing workloads
with little to no modifications parallel
cluster integrates seamlessly with
elastic fabric adapter
a network interface for amazon ec2
instances
that allow for low latency low jitter
channel performance for inter instance
communications
this makes it possible to scale tightly
coupled applications
to thousands of cpus or gpus
use aws with parallel cluster to quickly
launch and manage your hpc compute
environment
today
